text: Big Timber is a city in, and the county seat of Sweet Grass County, Montana, United States. The population was 1,650 at the 2020 census. It became the county seat in 1895. The Boulder River joins the Yellowstone River at Big Timber. ==References== ==Other websites== * Big Timber/Sweet Grass County Chamber of Commerce Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Big Timber, Montana
